unnormalised: Bore, konnainch utsovachea tarikhanche vixim vicharlem, hã? Bore, Bharoti utsovank lagun yevzonn korop mhunnttlear ekdekhnn jhely vhonti lagounchea bhaxen - ti halnchich ravta! Udharonnakhatir, lok "Diwali kedna asa?" mhunn Diwali poros sumar 365 dis poilim vicharunk lagtat. Magir, tumi khonntea panchangak fattlavtat tache voir astolem, ti vo 01/11/2024 vo 02/11/2024 zateli. Tem sōdunk tumkam subhechha! Ekadashi vixim mhaka ulounch di naka... dorek vorsak tim 24 asat!
normalised: Okay, mhonnlle konnem festival-ache tarikhe vishim vicharle, hã? Barabor, Bharotiya festanchem niyojan korop mhollear deko bhintir marunk soddlea bhaxen - ti haltat ravta! Udharonnak, lok "Diwali kedna asa?" mhonn sangon Diwali-chea sumar tinxem satth panch disam adim passun vichrunk lagtat. Ani magir, tumi kontem panchang follow kortat, tacher adharit asa, ti ek tarek November don hazar vis ani chovvis vo don tarek November don hazar vis ani chovvis zateli. Tem sodunk tumkam bhog! Ekadashi vishim mhaka soddlearuch bore... dor vorsa tashiं vis ani chovvis asat!

unnormalised: Ani velanche vixim ulouya. Muhurat vel - novean kaam suru korpak labhdayak vel. Mazi aji chai toyar korche poilim-i Pandit ji-k vicharta, mhunnche mhunnlear chai khatir muhurat vel boro asunk zai, LOL. "Beta, thik 11:37 AM-ak suru kor, ek second-i adim vo uprant naka!" Thik asa, Aji!
normalised: Ani vaitt'taichea velanchem uloiam. Muhurat vel - nove kary suru korpak shubh vel. Mhaji aji chai korchea adimuy Pandit ji-k vicharta, mhonnllear chai korpache muhuratachem vel chukechem mhunn astachem, H-A-S-O. "Beta, sumar ekra vorsa satatris mintam A-M-ak suruvat kor, ek second adim vo magir nhoi!" Barabor, Aji!

unnormalised: Magir asa Holi. Ti 25/03/2024 vo 26/03/2024 asteli? Pauz poddtto? Mhaka dheskurengi mhajea voir vhanttlo mhunn distto? Him mhotvachim proxn! Pro tip: sodea puranne kopdde ghalat.
normalised: Ani Holi asa. Ti povis tarek March don hazar vis ani chovvis asa vo pavis tarek March don hazar vis ani chovvis? Pavs poddtolo? Mhaka eka indradhanushyacheo rang bhaxen distolo? Heo mahatvache prashn! Tip: Sodek porne kapdde ghatat.

unnormalised: Gommbhirponnan, him tarikho chandra kalendrachea ani jyotishachya ganitancher adharitalim astat, zantunt satty sangchem zalear, ugrade ganit asta. Konn tori ek zann khainch tori bhov vhoddlyean calculator gheun bosun mhunnta "Bore asa chandr বৃহস্পতি poros itlo pois astelo, tor Mangallar donparchea 14:00 vorancher dhoruya."
normalised: Jithem bhaxen, heo tarikheo chandra calendar ani jyotishiya gannitancher adharit asatat, jim, satyam sangon, aagadim ganit asa. Konn tori kitei eka tharavlelea zagear eka motte calculaator gheun bosun astolo ani mhontto "Barabor chandra Jupiter-chea pasun D-H-A-N-G asat, tenna choddi mhonnllear chaudda zero zero tas Mangalvarak."

unnormalised: Mhunnche, 'kedna [utsovachem naam hanga ghalchem]' hacho zobab sodanch asta: "Tem adharun asta... ani tumchi soglli bhonvddichi toyari adinch korun dovortat fottkiro zateli mhunn." Tumkam subhechha! Tumkam tachi goroz asteli!
normalised: Tenna, 'kedna asa [festivachem nav]' hea prashnak ut'tor soglea velar: "Tacher adharit asa... ani tumchea sogllea prayanchem niyojan velacher karun dhorat!" Tumkam bhog! Tumkam tachi goroz zateli!
